done.text:
Successfully completed the task! I have opened the Wikipedia article on Mercury (planet).

Workflow completed:
1. ‚úì Launched Web Browser and navigated to Google homepage
2. ‚úì Entered search query: 'article on mercury on Wikipedia'
3. ‚úì Executed the search
4. ‚úì Clicked on the relevant Wikipedia link from search results

The Wikipedia article on Mercury (planet) is now open and accessible at: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mercury_(planet)

The page has loaded successfully with all content visible, including the table of contents showing sections on nomenclature, physical characteristics, orbit and rotation, observation, and observation history.
